name: Dratini
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dratini
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Dragonair
Attack2Text: Discard the top card of your deck.

name: Dragonair
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from each of your Pokemon.

name: Dragonite

Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

name: Shelgon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Salamence
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent discard cards from his or her hand until he or she has 4 cards left in his or her hand.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Latias
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Latios is on your Bench, heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Latios
Attack1Text: If Latias is on your Bench, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Rayquaza
Attack1Text: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Axew
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for Fraxure, reveal it, and put it into your hand, Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Axew
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Fraxure
AbilityText: If this Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, each of its attacks does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Haxorus

name: Druddigon
